Based on your preferences for Italian movies with an emphasis on their love story, I recommend checking out the following two Italian movies:

1. "Il Bacio" (The Kiss) directed by Federico Fellini. This is one of the most famous and beloved Italian movies of all time.

2. "La Dolce vita" (The Sweet Life) directed by Vittorio De Sica. This is another classic Italian movie that is loved by audiences around the world.

Both "Il Bacio" and "La Dolce vita" are great Italian movies that you should definitely check out if you're interested in Italian movies with an emphasis on their love story.

I would recommend "Psychic Experiment" based on your preferences for genre and plot keywords. This movie is about a love experiment where people are put into situations that they find difficult, but eventually succeed in overcoming the difficulty.
The main character of this movie is Dr. Jekyll, who is a wealthy man who spends his time drinking alcohol to excess. When he drinks excessively, he transforms into his alter ego, Dr. Henry Murtagh, who is a more responsible and conscientious person.
Dr. Jekyll is the protagonist of this movie, and he plays a central role in the story. He sets out on a mission to test the limits of human behavior, and he does so by putting himself in situations that he finds difficult, but eventually succeed in overcoming the difficulty.
Throughout the course of his mission, Dr. Jekyll faces numerous challenges and obstacles, including the difficulty of controlling his impulses and desires when he is under stress or pressure from external sources.
Despite these challenges and obstacles, Dr. Jekyll remains determined and resolute in his efforts to complete his mission and fulfill his goals and objectives.
In conclusion, "Psychic Experiment" is a classic movie that tells an interesting and engaging story about the limits of human behavior.
